actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture to continue operation of the Agricultural Research Service field station at Newell, S. Dak.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to continue to operate the Agricultural Research Service field station at Newell, South Dakota, until June 30, 1976. Requires the number of employees maintained at the station to be not less than the number employed on December 31, 1972.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture to continue operation of the Agricultural Research Service field station at Newell, S. Dak.
